role_description: An Ansible role that installs Lollypop Music Player on Linux distros
role_description_full_overview: [Lollypop](https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/Lollypop) is a lightweight modern music player designed to work excellently on the GNOME desktop environment. Lollypop also features a party mode which will automatically select party-related playlists to play; a full-screen view which lets you visually access the player from your couch thanks to its HiDPI support; and native support for replay gain.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Lollypop Music Player on Linux distros.
